verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> about אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> unto them I am the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֧ה <S%H4639><s%> After the doings אֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרַ֛יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> where יְשַׁבְתֶּם־ <S%H3427><s%> wherein ye dwelt בָּ֖הּ לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תַעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> shall ye not do וּכְמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> and after the doings אֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> of the land כְּנַ֡עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> where אֲנִי֩ <S%H589><s%> I am מֵבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> whither I bring אֶתְכֶ֥ם <S%H853><s%> שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <S%H8033><s%> in it לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תַעֲשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> you shall ye not do וּבְחֻקֹּתֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H2708><s%> in their ordinances לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תֵלֵֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> walk

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁפָּטַ֧י <S%H4941><s%> my judgments תַּעֲשׂ֛וּ <S%H6213><s%> Ye shall do וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֻקֹּתַ֥י <S%H2708><s%> mine ordinances תִּשְׁמְר֖וּ <S%H8104><s%> and keep לָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to live בָּהֶ֑ם אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> therein I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֤ם <S%H8104><s%> Ye shall therefore keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֻקֹּתַי֙ <S%H2708><s%> my statutes וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁפָּטַ֔י <S%H4941><s%> and my judgments אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> do אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> הָאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> if a man וָחַ֣י <S%H2425><s%> he shall live בָּהֶ֑ם אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> in them I [am] the LORD ס

אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to any אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> he אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any שְׁאֵ֣ר <S%H7607><s%> that is near בְּשָׂר֔וֹ <S%H1320><s%> of kin לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִקְרְב֖וּ <S%H7126><s%> None of you shall approach לְגַלּ֣וֹת <S%H1540><s%> to him to uncover עֶרְוָ֑ה <S%H6172><s%> [their] nakedness אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> God ס

עֶרְוַ֥ת <S%H6172><s%> The nakedness אָבִ֛יךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy father וְעֶרְוַ֥ת <S%H6172><s%> or the nakedness אִמְּךָ֖ <S%H517><s%> of thy mother לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תְגַלֵּ֑ה <S%H1540><s%> shalt thou not uncover אִמְּךָ֣ <S%H517><s%> she [is] thy mother הִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> are not תְגַלֶּ֖ה <S%H1540><s%> thou shalt not uncover עֶרְוָתָֽהּ׃ <S%H6172><s%> her nakedness ס

עֶרְוַ֥ת <S%H6172><s%> The nakedness אֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H802><s%> wife אָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy father's לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תְגַלֵּ֑ה <S%H1540><s%> shalt thou not uncover עֶרְוַ֥ת <S%H6172><s%> nakedness אָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> it [is] thy father's הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he ס

עֶרְוַ֨ת <S%H6172><s%> The nakedness אֲחֽוֹתְךָ֤ <S%H269><s%> of thy sister בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> of thy father א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> or daughter אִמֶּ֔ךָ <S%H517><s%> of thy mother מוֹלֶ֣דֶת <S%H4138><s%> [whether she be] born בַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> at home א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> or מוֹלֶ֣דֶת <S%H4138><s%> or born ח֑וּץ <S%H2351><s%> abroad לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תְגַלֶּ֖ה <S%H1540><s%> thou shalt not uncover עֶרְוָתָֽן׃ <S%H6172><s%> [even] their nakedness ס

עֶרְוַ֤ת <S%H6172><s%> The nakedness בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter בִּנְךָ֙ <S%H1121><s%> of thy son's א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בַֽת־ <S%H1323><s%> or of thy daughter's בִּתְּךָ֔ <S%H1323><s%> daughter לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תְגַלֶּ֖ה <S%H1540><s%> thou shalt not uncover עֶרְוָתָ֑ן <S%H6172><s%> [even] their nakedness כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for עֶרְוָתְךָ֖ <S%H6172><s%> [is] thine own nakedness הֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2007><s%> for theirs ס

עֶרְוַ֨ת <S%H6172><s%> The nakedness בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter אֵ֤שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife's אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> of thy father's מוֹלֶ֣דֶת <S%H4138><s%> begotten אָבִ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy father אֲחוֹתְךָ֖ <S%H269><s%> she [is] thy sister הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תְגַלֶּ֖ה <S%H1540><s%> thou shalt not uncover עֶרְוָתָֽהּ׃ <S%H6172><s%> her nakedness ס

עֶרְוַ֥ת <S%H6172><s%> the nakedness אֲחוֹת־ <S%H269><s%> sister אָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy father's לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תְגַלֵּ֑ה <S%H1540><s%> Thou shalt not uncover שְׁאֵ֥ר <S%H7607><s%> near kinswoman אָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> she [is] thy father's הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he ס

עֶרְוַ֥ת <S%H6172><s%> the nakedness אֲחֽוֹת־ <S%H269><s%> sister אִמְּךָ֖ <S%H517><s%> of thy mother's לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תְגַלֵּ֑ה <S%H1540><s%> Thou shalt not uncover כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שְׁאֵ֥ר <S%H7607><s%> near kinswoman אִמְּךָ֖ <S%H517><s%> for she [is] thy mother's הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he ס

עֶרְוַ֥ת <S%H6172><s%> the nakedness אֲחִֽי־ <S%H251><s%> brother אָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy father's לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תְגַלֵּ֑ה <S%H1540><s%> Thou shalt not uncover אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אִשְׁתּוֹ֙ <S%H802><s%> to his wife לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִקְרָ֔ב <S%H7126><s%> thou shalt not approach דֹּדָֽתְךָ֖ <S%H1733><s%> she [is] thine aunt הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he ס

עֶרְוַ֥ת <S%H6172><s%> the nakedness כַּלָּֽתְךָ֖ <S%H3618><s%> of thy daughter in law לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תְגַלֵּ֑ה <S%H1540><s%> Thou shalt not uncover אֵ֤שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife בִּנְךָ֙ <S%H1121><s%> she [is] thy son's הִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תְגַלֶּ֖ה <S%H1540><s%> thou shalt not uncover עֶרְוָתָֽהּ׃ <S%H6172><s%> her nakedness ס

עֶרְוַ֥ת <S%H6172><s%> the nakedness אֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H802><s%> wife אָחִ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> of thy brother's לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תְגַלֵּ֑ה <S%H1540><s%> Thou shalt not uncover עֶרְוַ֥ת <S%H6172><s%> nakedness אָחִ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> it [is] thy brother's הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he ס

עֶרְוַ֥ת <S%H6172><s%> the nakedness אִשָּׁ֛ה <S%H802><s%> of a woman וּבִתָּ֖הּ <S%H1323><s%> and her daughter לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תְגַלֵּ֑ה <S%H1540><s%> Thou shalt not uncover אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter בְּנָ֞הּ <S%H1121><s%> her son's וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> or her daughter's בִּתָּ֗הּ <S%H1323><s%> daughter לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִקַּח֙ <S%H3947><s%> neither shalt thou take לְגַלּ֣וֹת <S%H1540><s%> to uncover עֶרְוָתָ֔הּ <S%H6172><s%> her nakedness שַׁאֲרָ֥ה <S%H7608><s%> [for] they [are] her near kinswomen הֵ֖נָּה <S%H2007><s%> in זִמָּ֥ה <S%H2154><s%> it [is] wickedness הִֽוא <S%H1931><s%> he

וְאִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> a wife אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> addition אֲחֹתָ֖הּ <S%H269><s%> to her sister לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִקָּ֑ח <S%H3947><s%> Neither shalt thou take לִצְרֹ֗ר <S%H6887><s%> to vex לְגַלּ֧וֹת <S%H1540><s%> [her] to uncover עֶרְוָתָ֛הּ <S%H6172><s%> her nakedness עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> in בְּחַיֶּֽיהָ׃ <S%H2416><s%> beside the other in her life

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> unto a woman בְּנִדַּ֣ת <S%H5079><s%> as long as she is put apart טֻמְאָתָ֑הּ <S%H2932><s%> for her uncleanness לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִקְרַ֔ב <S%H7126><s%> Also thou shalt not approach לְגַלּ֖וֹת <S%H1540><s%> to uncover עֶרְוָתָֽהּ׃ <S%H6172><s%> her nakedness

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֵ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H802><s%> wife עֲמִֽיתְךָ֔ <S%H5997><s%> with thy neighbour's לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> Moreover thou shalt not שְׁכָבְתְּךָ֖ <S%H7903><s%> lie לְזָ֑רַע <S%H2233><s%> carnally לְטָמְאָה־ <S%H2930><s%> to defile בָֽהּ׃

וּמִֽזַּרְעֲךָ֥ <S%H2233><s%> let any of thy seed לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> And thou shalt not לְהַעֲבִ֣יר <S%H5674><s%> pass לַמֹּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4432><s%> through [the fire] to Molech וְלֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> nor תְחַלֵּ֛ל <S%H2490><s%> neither shalt thou profane אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> the name אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> of thy God אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD

וְאֶ֨ת־ <S%H854><s%> with זָכָ֔ר <S%H2145><s%> with mankind לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִשְׁכַּ֖ב <S%H7901><s%> Thou shalt not lie מִשְׁכְּבֵ֣י <S%H4904><s%> as with אִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> womankind תּוֹעֵבָ֖ה <S%H8441><s%> it [is] abomination הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any בְּהֵמָ֛ה <S%H929><s%> with any beast לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> Neither shalt thou שְׁכָבְתְּךָ֖ <S%H7903><s%> lie לְטָמְאָה־ <S%H2930><s%> to defile בָ֑הּ וְאִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> thyself therewith neither shall any woman לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תַעֲמֹ֞ד <S%H5975><s%> stand לִפְנֵ֧י <S%H6440><s%> before בְהֵמָ֛ה <S%H929><s%> a beast לְרִבְעָ֖הּ <S%H7250><s%> to lie down תֶּ֥בֶל <S%H8397><s%> thereto it [is] confusion הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּֽטַּמְּא֖וּ <S%H2930><s%> Defile בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> not ye yourselves in any of these things כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> by בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> things נִטְמְא֣וּ <S%H2930><s%> are defiled הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> for in all these the nations אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am מְשַׁלֵּ֖חַ <S%H7971><s%> which I cast out מִפְּנֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וַתִּטְמָ֣א <S%H2930><s%> is defiled הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> And the land וָאֶפְקֹ֥ד <S%H6485><s%> therefore I do visit עֲוֹנָ֖הּ <S%H5771><s%> the iniquity עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and וַתָּקִ֥א <S%H6958><s%> itself vomiteth out הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thereof upon it and the land אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֹשְׁבֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H3427><s%> her inhabitants

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֣ם <S%H8104><s%> Ye shall therefore keep אַתֶּ֗ם <S%H859><s%> you אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֻקֹּתַי֙ <S%H2708><s%> my statutes וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁפָּטַ֔י <S%H4941><s%> and my judgments וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and shall not תַעֲשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> and shall not commit מִכֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner הַתּוֹעֵבֹ֖ת <S%H8441><s%> [any] of these abominations הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these הָֽאֶזְרָ֔ח <S%H249><s%> [neither] any of your own nation וְהַגֵּ֖ר <S%H1616><s%> nor any stranger הַגָּ֥ר <S%H1481><s%> that sojourneth בְּתוֹכְכֶֽם׃ <S%H8432><s%> among
